message.name: ERR_PERFORMANCEMEASURE_FV_MEASURE_NOT_APPLICABLE_FOR_SPECIFIED_APPLICABLE_TO
message.locale: The Applicable To must be, %1c, for the performance measure, %2c.

message.name: ERR_PERFORMANCEMEASURE_FV_MEASURE_NOT_APPLICABLE_FOR_SPECIFIED_OUTPUT
message.locale: The Output must be, %1c, for the performance measure, %2c.

message.name: ERR_PERFORMANCEMEASURE_XRV_ASSOCIATED_WITH_SERVICE_OFFERING_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The performance measure, %1c, is related to at least one service offering, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_SOPERFORMANCEMEASURE_XRV_APPLICABLE_TO_PROVIDER_ONLY_CANNOT_BE_ADDED
message.locale: The performance measure is applicable to, '%1c', it cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_SOPERFORMANCEMEASURE_FV_MUST_SELECT_ATLEAST_ONE_MEASURE
message.locale: At least one Measure must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PERFORMANCEMEASURE_FV_MUST_SELECT_ATLEAST_ONE_PERFORMANCE_MEASURE
message.locale: At least one performance measure must be selected.

message.name: INF_PERFORMANCEMEASURE_CALCULATION_LOGIC_NOT_SET_UP
message.locale: The logic required to calculate the value for this performance measure is not set up.
